name: Climb! 2
description:
Blocks falling from the sky... All they wanna do is CRUSH you...

But they don't know that you now have a grappling gun and the ability to shoot and DESTROY them!!!!

Climb, Shoot and Grapple your way to greater heights with this thrilling game of who comes out on top! LITERALLY!

Compete to take over the leader boards and claim your spot at the PINNACLE of control and precision as you assume the character of extreme mobility and block shattering power!!!!

Claim the top leaderboards to get ultimate bragging rights and become 

THE CLIMB!er !!!

I hope you have as much fun playing it as i had making it!

Cheers.

#ScoreSPACEJAM
